key_points: Chris Cuomo's removal from CNN's prime time impacted the network's rating negatively.
Cuomo Prime Time was the highest-rated prime time hour on CNN before Cuomo's firing.
CNN's 9 p.m. hour witnessed its lowest-rated week of 2021 after Cuomo's departure.
CNN Tonight's viewership dropped to 616,000 from 745,000 the week before Cuomo was suspended.
Fox News Channel's Hannity dominated the 9 p.m. slot with a total audience of 2.7 million viewers.
Among the key demographic of viewers aged 25-54, CNN Tonight had an average audience of 142,000 viewers.
Fox News' The Five was the most-watched show of the week, with 3.384 million viewers.
Tucker Carlson Tonight led the key demographic with a total audience of 529,000 viewers.
The article discusses the impact of Chris Cuomo's firing on CNN's prime time ratings.
Comparison of CNN's ratings against Fox News shows a significant viewership gap.
